title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Keynote with CEO Matt Garman
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 首席执行官Matt Garman主题演讲
abstract: Join AWS CEO Matt Garman to hear how AWS is innovating across every aspect of the world’s leading cloud. He explores how we are reinventing foundational building blocks as well as developing brand new experiences, all to empower customers and partners with what they need to build a better future.
abstract_cn: 加入AWS首席执行官Matt Garman，了解AWS如何在全球领先云计算的各个方面进行创新。他探讨了我们如何重塑基础构建模块以及开发全新体验，所有这些都是为了赋能客户和合作伙伴构建更美好的未来所需的能力。
